block.p: In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.

$955,000 165 Perry Street 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,600-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; elevator, large living room, 12-ft. ceilings, h/w floors, washer/dryer in unit, south exposure; maintenance $1,509, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $1.05 million, 8 weeks on market (Broker: Debra Kameros & Co.)

$575,000 445 East 86th Street 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,200-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, renovated kitchen with granite countertops, renovated baths, crown moldings, 2 exposures; maintenance $860, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $575,000, 2 weeks on market (Brokers: Heron; Bellmarc)
In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.

$955,000 165 Perry Street 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,600-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; elevator, large living room, 12-ft. ceilings, h/w floors, washer/dryer in unit, south exposure; maintenance $1,509, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $1.05 million, 8 weeks on market (Broker: Debra Kameros & Co.)

$575,000 445 East 86th Street 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,200-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, renovated kitchen with granite countertops, renovated baths, crown moldings, 2 exposures; maintenance $860, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $575,000, 2 weeks on market (Brokers: Heron; Bellmarc)

$352,000 267 West 89th Street 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 750-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; part-time doormen, dining area, renovated windowed kitchen, h/w floors; maintenance $653, 38% tax-deductible; listed at $359,000, 4 weeks on market (Brokers: Klara Madlin Real Estate; Halstead Property Co.)

1-bedroom, 1-bath, 560-sq.-ft. condo in a prewar building; windowed kitchen, h/w floors, south exposure; common charge $339; taxes $1,800; listed at $299,000, 5 weeks on market (Broker: Corcoran Group)

$715,000 150 West 56th Street (Cityspire) 1-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 915-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, attended elevator, dining area, h/w floors, 2 exposures; common charge $530; taxes $6,000; listed at $740,000, 10 weeks on market (Broker: Douglas Elliman)

$160,000 3636 Greystone Avenue (Richmond) 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,300-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; elevator, dining area, sunken living room, h/w floors; maintenance $896, 47% tax-deductible; listed at $165,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Trebach)

$105,000 2601 Henry Hudson Parkway (Riviera) 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,100-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; part-time doormen, dining area, h/w floors, terrace, east exposure; maintenance $584, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $125,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: John Edwards Real Estate)

$460,000 126 Fourth Place 2-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 1,200-sq.-ft. triplex condo in a 10-year-old building; private entrance, home office, fireplace, parking space; common charge $348; taxes $4,764; listed at $499,000, 3 weeks on market (Broker: Brooklyn Bridge Realty)

$130,000 185 Prospect Park Southwest 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 800-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; elevator, entry foyer, dining area, large kitchen with dishwasher, h/w floors; maintenance $443, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $139,000, 4 weeks on market (Broker: Orrichio & Anderson)

$212,000 80-07 170th Street 2-family, 81-year-old stone house; 3 bedrooms, 1 1/2 baths, eat-in kitchen with breakfast nook in primary duplex; 1 bedroom, 1 bath in simplex; dining room in each; private driveway, 30-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $1,696; listed at $258,888, 1 week on market (Broker: ReMax/Millennium)

$565,000 69-46 Harrow Street 4-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 55-year-old detached Tudor; dining room, eat-in kitchen, sun room, fireplace, finished basement, 2-car garage, 40-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $2,600; listed at $599,000, 5 weeks on market (Broker: Terrace)

$305,000 103 Bathgate Street 4-bedroom, 1-bath, 46-year-old Cape Cod; entry foyer, eat-in kitchen, den, fieldstone fireplace, new bay window, finished basement, in-ground pool, 60-by-95-ft. lot; taxes $1,682; listed at $330,000, 12 weeks on market (Broker: Kingsley)
$211,000 28 Serpentine Lane 4-bedroom, 2-bath, 49-year-old ranch; dining room, 60-by-125-ft. lot; taxes $4,972; listed at $219,000, 12 weeks on market (Broker: Manor Gate)

$332,000 10 Princeton Avenue 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 2-year-old contemporary bi-level; formal dining room, living room with cathedral ceiling and skylights, c/a, deck, full basement, 1-car attached garage, 1/4-acre lot; taxes $8,072; listed at $337,500, 4 weeks on market (Broker: Anastasio Associates)

$290,000 52 Syracuse Street 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 70-year-old vinyl-sided colonial; eat-in kitchen, formal dining room, Florida room, finished basement, 2-car detached garage, 40-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $3,200; listed at $299,000, 10 days on market (Broker: Atanas)

$465,000 1 Valley Court 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 13-year-old colonial; 2-story entry foyer, dining room, family room, library, 2-story fieldstone fireplace, sitting room, wine cellar, finished basement, in-ground pool, 2-car garage, 0.8-acre lot; taxes $7,519; listed at $479,000, 20 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential Connecticut)

$725,000 38 Hettiefred Road 4-bedroom, 4-bath, 44-year-old colonial ranch, renovated last year; dining area, family room with wet bar, eat-in kitchen, h/w floors, 2-car garage, 1.68-acre lot; taxes $5,505; listed at $754,250, 3 weeks on market (Brokers: Weichert; Coldwell Banker/Greenwich)

$387,400 96 Lexington Way 5-bedroom, 4 1/2-bath, 5-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, finished basement, 3-car garage, 0.23-acre lot; taxes $5,845; listed at $389,900, 12 weeks on market (Brokers: Coldwell Banker; William Pitt Real Estate)

$285,000 60 Wilton Crest 2-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 1,449-sq.-ft. 14-year-old town-house condo; dining room, eat-in kitchen, vaulted ceilings, fireplace, bedroom skylight, interior patio, 1-car garage; common charge $419; taxes $3,236; listed at $295,000, 2 weeks on market (Brokers: Century 21; Coldwell Banker/ Tilghman & Frost)

$470,000 199 Byram Lake Road 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 81-year-old colonial; entry hall, living room w/fireplace, eat-in kitchen, screened porch, 1/2-acre lot; taxes $6,697; listed at $479,000, 5 weeks on market (Brokers: Houlihan/Lawrence; Leonard Young Real Estate)

$227,500 3 Forest Lane 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 71-year-old colonial; entry hall, living room w/ wood- burning stove, eat-in kitchen, 0.18-acre lot; taxes $4,300; listed at $229,900, 26 weeks on market (Brokers: Frances Billingsley Realty; Houlihan/Lawrence)

$285,000 175 Ramsey Avenue 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 74-year-old colonial; living room w/fireplace, heated sun room, eat-in kitchen, 0.17-acre lot; taxes $4,665; listed at $299,000, 10 weeks on market (Brokers: Prudential Ragett√©; Denton-Tonkin)

$62,500 216 Heather Croft 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 800-sq.-ft. condo in a 15-year-old building; c/a, dining room, w/w carpeting; common charge $165; taxes $1,323; listed at $62,500, 6 weeks on market (Broker: Richards Agency)

$1.35 million 6 Brannick Drive 5-bedroom, 3-full-, 2-half-bath, 6-year-old colonial; eat-in kitchen, patio, deck, 3-car garage, 0.52-acre lot; taxes $14,122; listed at $1.29 million (multiple bids), 9 days on market (Broker: Prudential New Jersey)
$540,000 98 Deer Trail 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 30-year-old ranch; new kitchen, 2 fireplaces, h/w floors, 189-by-214 ft. lot; taxes $9,859; listed at $549,000, 4 months on market (Broker: Weichert)

$865,000 2 Kips Ridge 4-bedroom, 4-bath, three-level 3,700-sq.-ft. condo in a 10-year-old town house; c/a, marble baths, elevator, Manhattan skyline views; common charge $450; taxes $15,869; listed at $895,000, 7 weeks on market (Brokers: Burgdorff ERA; Weichert)
